scripts.prepublish: npm run cleanup:aigis && npm run build
scripts.minify:css: find dist/css -name '*.css' | xargs -I{} cssnano {} {}.min --no-zindex && find dist/css -name '*.css.min' | sed 'p;s/.css.min/.min.css/' | xargs -n2 mv
scripts.minify:js: find dist/js -name '*.js' | xargs -I{} uglifyjs {} -o {}.min -mc && find dist/js -name '*.js.min' | sed 'p;s/.js.min/.min.js/' | xargs -n2 mv
scripts.minify:aigis:css: find dist/aigis/aigis_assets/css -name '*.css' -maxdepth 1 | xargs -I{} cssnano {} {}.min --no-zindex && find dist/aigis/aigis_assets/css -name '*.css.min' | sed 'p;s/.css.min/.min.css/' | xargs -n2 mv
scripts.minify:aigis:js: find dist/aigis/aigis_assets/js -name '*.js' | xargs -I{} uglifyjs {} -o {}.min -mc && find dist/aigis/aigis_assets/js -name '*.js.min' | sed 'p;s/.js.min/.min.js/' | xargs -n2 mv
scripts.css: npm run cleanup:css && npm-run-all -s css:sass css:postcss minify:css
scripts.js: npm run cleanup:js && npm run js:rollup && npm run minify:js
scripts.aigis:js: npm run aigis:js:rollup && npm run minify:aigis:js
scripts.aigis: npm run cleanup:aigis && aigis run -c src/aigis/aigis_config.yml && npm-run-all -p aigis:css aigis:js
scripts.zip: rimraf basis.zip && rsync -a --exclude '.*' --exclude '/basis/' --exclude '/node_modules/' --exclude '/bin/' ./ basis && cd basis && cd ../ && zip -9 -qmr basis.zip basis
